Woman who caused security scare on Paris-Charlotte flight will face no charges

Lucie Zeeko Marigot, 41, who caused a security scare that resulted in a flight being diverted to Maine, will be returned to France, prosecutors said. (Globe, 4:43 p.m.)

Papers: Phoenix sold WFNX for $14.5m

Phoenix Media is selling rock station WFNX 101.7 FM for $14.5 million, according to documents released today by the FCC, which must approve the sale. (Globe, 2:40 p.m.)

Egyptians hold landmark vote

Egypt held the Arab world's first competitive presidential race Wednesday, wrestling with a polarizing choice between secularists rooted in Hosni Mubarak's old regime and Islamists hoping to infuse the state with religion.
